topic.title: Initial selling proposition: PT04.01.01
topic.shortdesc: Initial selling proposition is the information that salesperson gives to its potential client.

body.p: There is huge misunderstanding between Salesperson and Project team. The problem is that our products are mainly custom and complicated. To shorten the misunderstanding gaps, Business Analyst (consulting) Role exist.

It's crucial to lead potential client to the purchasing the products smoothly but Business Analyst starts communicate with salesperson and client lately, when some wrong promises may be given to the potential client. Wrong promise leads to lost client.

If given to potential client information doesn't align to standard (despite of custom approach) products and we want to have this client, Project team faced to wasting time and money on creating custom components add-ons on the Project level. While there are standard solutions that aligns with clients required tasks, though they handles those tasks with a bit different way client suppose to.

Initial selling proposition is a starting point for future Project Implementation process. Salesperson gives to potential client some information about products. But products are not the same as possibilities. It's important to understand the difference to offer products for a competitive price and deliver it for reasonable time schedule.
So, we must provide Salesperson with the correct information so that the Initial selling proposition is created based on enterprise products that are described in the Knowledge Base portal.
To get information you need to handle the task you may go to section and review product tasks (feature) list. You may use portal full text searching possibilities or AI agent.
Instead, you may go through following Step by step guidance to find information about banking specific task.

li.p: Find out with your client what banking Role handles the task and what Category the task is.

Go to Knowledge Base section Roles and select the Role client mentioned to review tasks that are assigned to this RoleWe recommend you to open the Role's task list in a new tab to comfortably switch between this guide and needed sections
Find within the task list the task (task title) client is talking about
Select task title within the list and main Task page will be opened
Select Task handle UI page parameter to review the UI page for the Task handling and its video demo
Select Step-by-step guidance section to review how to handle the task
Use Task's PID to include it to the initial selling proposition If we have such tool, the Initial selling proposition document will be generated automatically.
Go to the next client's need.
